_meanings:
{@--1@} To join, bring 
together, unite, combine, put together,
compound, mix; {#yAni udakena#} 
{#saMDIyaMte tAni BakzaRIyAni#} <ls>Kull.</ls>

{@--3@} To fix upon, direct towards;
{#saMdaDe dfSamudagratArakAM#} <ls>R. 11. 69.</ls>

{@--9@} To grasp, support,
take hold of.

{@--19@} To 
employ, make use of, apply to use.
